isb:document.p: This page is an archive of model definition files for biomolecular systems that have been found to be useful or interesting in our group's research.

The filename suffix of each model definition file indicates its format. The possible formats for model definition files, and the filename suffxes of each model definition file format, are described in the Dizzy User Manual.

ul.li: Simple stochastic model of transcription of a single gene, with two transcription factors TFA and TFB
Simple stochastic model of GAL4 system, from S. cerevisiae
